channel.title: Barrows
channel.description:
I need working barrows cus my server hasent got barrows and i dont want to spawn to ppl or even if u cud add them in the shop i would really like it if any of u new how to add barrows
help me plz Joe_dilkes@hotmail.com

item.title: Barrows
item.dc:creator: @Soul_Breaker Soul Breaker
item.description:
@Soul_Breaker wrote:

You don’t need to use hiyascape, it’s how you edit the server and put more features to it.
I’m not saying it’s bad, but i’m just telling you, you don’t need to use it. You can create
ur server to a beautiful one.

You want to add it?
Well, go to the client of moparscape and go to help. Press the item Id and search guthan, you can search more if you know the barrow names which are Karil, Ahrim, Dharok, Torag, Verac and of course Guthan.

Open your item.cfg and copy one of the codes in it.
Copy and paste it at the end of all the codes, just change the item Id. Then that’s it, if you want to change bonuses
You know the 12 zero’s change them.

Read full topic
